name: virtualize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change something that exists in a real form into a virtual version (= one that is created using a computer): The project enabled users to visit virtualized art galleries at the Berlin Gallery Weekend.
to create a virtual version or several virtual versions of a piece of computer equipment or software: In this way we can virtualize key applications, and then offer them to our family of companies via a secure, internal cloud infrastructure.
